## ErrorHandler class

Main error handler that implements the Chain of Responsibility pattern. Delegates error handling to specialized strategies based on error type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ErrorHandler 
```

## Example


```typescript
const errorHandler = new ErrorHandler([
  new HttpErrorHandlerStrategy(serializer, logger),
  new InputValidationErrorHandlerStrategy(logger),
  new FallbackErrorStrategy(logger)
]);

// Use in Express
app.use(errorHandler.handle);
```
